column5: I can access the original post in each thread, but all of the responses are showing up in "tree" form below... Thus, i have to click on each individual response in order to read... What's up wit dat?
while you are reading this thread go to the top of your post right side to options go down to display modes and click on standard life is good
well thanks to you both anyways!
Oh, I thought you meant all the whiny folks complainin' and what not...tryin' to bring down the board...is there a way to fix that?
